title: Collaborative Learning Program for Healthcare Professionals in Low- and Middle-Income Regions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical administrative experience and intermediate domain expertise
context.additional_context: Targeting healthcare managers/leaders, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more effective collaboration strategies with other medical professionals through work-based scenarios within one week.
Learners can complete a project that solves real-world work problems using blended learning materials applicable in limited internet environments.
Learners can upload team collaboration results to an LMS and conduct peer evaluations according to task-based instructional principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
